Description:
"Is this property yours “to be or not to be?”
Looking for the low maintenance lifestyle with all the luxury and accessibility you could ask for? Look no further as this impressive Officer abode and looking for new owners!
Save yourself the hassle of building when you can move in with everything completed from the exposed aggregate driveway to the merbau decked entrance.
The home comprises of four generous sized bedrooms, master located to front of the home with double glazed windows, an oversized walk-in robe and luxurious ensuite with double shower.
The remaining three bedrooms are located to the rear of the home, all with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
The stunning kitchen is the heart of the home with waterfall Caesar stone island bench and high quality stainless steel appliances such as 900mm oven and dishwasher.
Need space? The home boasts two separate living spaces for every member of the family to enjoy.
The home is set up perfectly for entertaining with a decked pergola with security shutters to keep out the weather allowing you to entertain all year round.
Other features of the home include internet points in nearly every room of the house, low maintenance yard, double garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum all located within walking distance to schools, shops, train station and parkland.
Call today to arrange a time to inspect.
Insights: 22 Shakespeare Grove, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
*** SOLD by Robert Petelinek at AgentX Real Estate Berwick ***
Proudly positioned on the high side of the street in the exclusive “Timbertop” Estate in Officer is this extremely well presented near new family home that is sure to impress! This home is complimented by:
* Four HUGE sized bedrooms (almost double in size). Large & oversized master bedroom complete with large WIR’s & private ensuite.
* Two separated & spacious living areas.
* Gorgeous kitchen complete with stone tops and quality modern stainless steel appliances & plethora of under bench & overheard cupboard space plus dishwasher.
* Decked alfresco entertaining area
The home also includes fully landscaped gardens, double remote garage with internal access, ducted heating, split system air conditioner, floating timber look flooring and so much more…Just around the corner from the new parklands, the only thing left to do is move in.

Description:
Officer Town Centre, Outstanding Opportunity
Auction: Saturday 7th October 2017 at 12.30pm (if not sold prior)
1016m2 (approx.) zoned Urban Growth Zone Schedule 4 (mixed use), properties like this do not come up often.
On the land is a gracious period home, well presented & with great street appeal.
Property features include:
*3 large bedrooms (bed 2 with reverse cycle split system), all serviced by the main updated bathroom with separate toilet
*Formal lounge (or 4th bedroom) with open fire place, family room with open fire place plus large meals area with reverse cycle split system
*Large kitchen with dishwasher
*Period features: 10ft ceilings, polished timber floors, ornate cornices, ceiling roses, picture rails, leadlight windows etc.
*Double garage (carpeted & with split system), decked verandah, side access, established gardens, HUGE BACKYARD!
Contact Geoff Powell on 0418 102 830

Description:
Bluechip Investment on 2000sqm
Urban Growth Zone -Schedule 3. A rare opportunity to secure a future development site in the heart of the Officer Precinct Structure Plan with a land area of 2000sqm (approx.). Erected on the property is a classic 1980’s Brick Veneer home comprising of four bedrooms, 1 bathroom, two living areas, pergola, garage and separate workshop. Suitable for a family looking for a huge backyard for the kids or the savvy developer looking lease out the property and invest in the future. With the growing demand for allotments of this size and infrastructure in the immediate area now full steam ahead, now is an exciting time to be living in Officer. Only minutes from the train station, sporting grounds and some of the finest schools in the area. Inspect with confidence that prices will only increase as the demand for housing grows.

Grand Location in Grandvue!
Be quick to secure this 476sqm block with a great 12.9m frontage. Live the Grandvue lifestyle!
This established and desired estate has life's conveniences right at your door step. From nearby primary and secondary schools, child care, shopping, sports and recreational facilities this area is prime position for the growing family. Enjoy the landscaped parks and walking tracks you'll find everything you need so close to home.
Easy freeway access from and nearby public transport allows for convenient travel to Melbourne's CBD, Fountain Gate Shopping Centre Beaconsfield and Berwick for a variety of specialty stores, cafes, restaurants, schools, TAFE and Monash University.
Jump on this one it won't last! Call today!

Warmth and Easy Living
Beautifully maintained, in peace with its private surroundings enjoy the privacy and convenience of this easy living residence. Comprising of three bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe, each of the remaining bedrooms feature built in robes. Light and spacious the living areas are complimented by lofty ceilings and full-length windows capturing those garden vistas that opens to a spacious outdoor entertaining deck. Adjoining the living room is a vogue kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
Complete with car accommodation for two vehicles under the roof line. Brilliantly located within the Arena Estate it is a short stroll from shopping facilities and public transport.
An inspection won't disappoint.

Description:
Modern Living in a Prime Location!
This perfectly presented home, portrays a modern façade and cleverly designed floor plan, this home has it all. Located in the sought-after Arcadia Estate in Officer, known for its fantastic location and accessibility to all amenities.
This sophisticated home comprises of a spacious and elegant kitchen fitted with overhead cupboards, breakfast bar, stainless steel dishwasher, 900mm stainless steel appliances and ample bench space overlooking the open plan meals and living area.
The contemporary master bedroom consists of a private ensuite and built in robe, additional two bedrooms fitted with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
Complimenting this seamless floorplan and beautiful home is an undercover alfresco area perfect for those who love to entertain or simply enjoying the outdoors on a nice summer night and looking on from the alfresco, is enough grass area for the kids to enjoy. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and double remote-control garage with internal and external access. Makes for an easy decision to settle on 34 Cranbrook Circuit!
When location is everything, look no further! Located close to schools, shops, freeways, transport and much more! What more could you want?
Call Nicola now to schedule an inspection or see us at our opens!

Description:
Grand Living in Grandvue!!
Perched high on the hill of one of Officer’s finest locations, 57 Grandvue Boulevard on a large 796sqm will be sure to impress with its quality of finishes inside and out.
Comprising of four very large bedrooms, with master suite enticing his and her walk-in robe with resort style ensuite with double vanity and large double shower. The remaining three bedrooms are oversized with the back two entailing walk in robes.
A high quality open plan kitchen with 20mm Caesar Stone bench tops, ample amount of cupboard and bench space with soft close drawers. Stainless steel Miele appliances with induction cooktop, self-cleaning oven and steam oven. A full butler’s pantry with sink and ample amount of preparation space. A formal dining area and three separate living zones makes for the perfect entertainer’s home.
Extra features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 9ft ceilings, remote garage, security screen and alarm system.
Moving outside you are welcomed with low maintenance gardens and an oversized double car garage (with side access). Huge alfresco area that has quality exposed aggregate concrete and large rear yard.
Location is the key with this home situated within walking distance of the Arena shops, Officer train stations St Francis Xavier College high school and the newly finished St Clare's primary school.
Look no further than this stunning home, be quick to inspect as this one will not last long.

Description:
Family Haven in Tranquil location
Take the mystique and romance of a contemporary character rendered front facade add the sleek, sophisticated and seriously stunning of architectural elegance, this home is unique in design and will captivate the most discerning buyer. Serenely situated in a quiet pocket in one of the fastest growing areas of Officer this stunning family residence will impress even the most astute buyer. With schools, shops and public transport all within walking distance, this location is second to none. Accommodation boasting four gorgeous bedrooms. The master inclusive of a magnificent ensuite and large walk-in robes and three no-less impressive bedrooms all featuring generous proportions and built in robes, family bathroom to accommodate. Entering the main residence, the solid warmly timber floors lead into the imposing living room and striking high ceilings with picture rails with picture windows framing garden views and inviting the light in. The open galley kitchen with caeser stone island bench integrates with the expansive living and meals, 900 Dual Fuel S/S Upright Cooker, the butler's pantry conceals the workings and clever floor plan design ensures the hub of the home is central to all. Continuing outside a neat alfresco area and plenty of room to kick the football around! Do not miss out on this opportunity call now to book your inspection!

Description:
Development site in Officer
4.087 hectares (10.1 acres) for development in Officer zoned residential. Has 2 existing brick houses. House 1 is 19 squares with 3 bedrooms and a study, master with ensuite, 2 living areas, outdoor entertaining area complete with pool and W. Class tram. House 2 is 20 squares with 2 bedrooms, master with ensuite, 2 large living areas. Both houses have double brick garages. Extensive shedding through out property, 1 with concrete floor and power. Machinery shed with power. Good fencing with post and rails and electric fences loose boxes for horses and a hay shed. Approximately 650 metres from the Princes Highway in the fast growing area of Officer. Close to schools, public transport, Sports grounds and the new council offices. Excellent development opportunity close to the new centre of Officer.

Description:
A Timbertop Opportunity!
This home is second to none, straight from a cover of a magazine – styled to perfection with all the premium fittings you would expect in a display home and more! Never been lived in, at just 3 years young, this home has been a display in the premium Timbertop Estate and includes plenty of added extras throughout. With an open, easy to live floor-plan the quality boutique built Yarrabank home consists of 3 spacious bedrooms – large master featuring deluxe ensuite and walk in robe, the remaining 2 bedrooms are complete with built in mirrored robes. The home comes complete with an impressive sunken theatre room all-inclusive of the deluxe theatre system for family entertainment. Built with the modern lifestyle in mind, the kitchen and living areas feature a stunning raked ceiling that allows light to flow throughout. The kitchen overlooks the meals and family room and offers plenty of cupboard space, upgraded 900mm oven, walk in pantry and ceaser stone bench tops and a beautiful breakfast bar. The home is perfect for year-round entertaining with alfresco under roofline and easy to maintain gardens with full sprinkler system. Other bonuses include, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, premium carpets, quality floor boards, feature lighting throughout, high ceilings …the list goes on. With a leaseback at 8% that expires in February 2018, this is an ideal investment opportunity! Be quick to ensure you do not miss out!

Description:
Brand New & Ready For You!
Phone Enquiry ID: 33704
On the fringe of town within a new and appealing estate, this brand-new four bedroom home is set on an easy-care 299sqm (approx) block. Quality built and packed with creature comforts, quality fittings and fixtures; first home buyers, young families, downsizers and investors will find plenty to get excited about - there’s really no reason to build from scratch!
Features include ducted heating and split system heating & cooling, a single remote garage with internal access, quality tiles, carpets and roller blinds throughout and NBN connection.
Four bedrooms with robes, a family bathroom with bath and shower - and the master bedroom with a walk-in-robe and ensuite. The generous, open plan living and dining zone adjoins a beautifully appointed kitchen with large Caesarstone benchtops/breakfast bar, stainless steel gas cooking appliances, range hood and dishwasher; plenty of overhead and under bench storage and a double pantry.
Opening to the alfresco area and easy-care backyard, ready for your own stamp to be applied to create an outdoor space you can enjoy throughout the year.
Just moments from a host of reputable schools like Officer Primary, Officer Secondary College Berwick Grammar, Heritage College and Maranatha Christian School, the train station, Arena Shopping Centre and Woolworths Lakeside, a bus stop less than 5 mintues away, and brilliant access to the Princes Hwy and the Monash for an easy commute in either direction to Pakenham, Beaconsfield, Berwick, the Bass Coast and Melbourne CBD in just 45 mins!

Description:
BRAND NEW & READY TO GO!
Want a BRAND NEW home but without the hassle of waiting for it?
Need a NEW INVESTMENT for max. capital depreciation? Then this GEM of a home from Hasteen Builders fits the bill PERFECTLY!
This open-plan home is absolutely ideal for the busy family. With low-maintenance yards, central kitchen/family area & 4 bedrooms, all with storage space makes it an easy place to live. The kitchen is wonderfully well fitted, maximising all of the available space for storage and very much on-trend.
Ducted heating throughout & a large split-system most certainly help to keep the home comfortable all year round, and security is assured with internal access to the double garage for easy access to the car.
Act FAST to avoid disappointment!

Description:
IT'S TIME TO MAKE IT YOURS !
Are you a first home buyer looking to enter the market? A downsizer wanting to enjoy retirement without the high maintenance that comes with a larger home? or maybe you're an investor wanting to begin or increase your portfolio? Whatever the case, this property is sure to interest you!
The inviting interior comprises of a large open plan living/dining area, a hostess kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and an island bench. The master suite is well equipped with a walk-in robe and private ensuite, while the remaining secondary bedrooms contain built in robes and share a central family bathroom.
All this and more on a low maintenance allotment of 338m2 with a well-kept private outdoor area, double car garage, gas ducted heating, split system cooling, in the highly sought-after Arcadia Estate.
You'll enjoy the proximity to Cardinia railway station, local buses, primary schools, secondary schools, kindergartens, parkland, plus local shopping precincts, cafes and restaurants.
This is a home that deserves an immediate inspection. You've got everything to gain, and nothing to lose! we look forward to seeing you at the open for inspection!
